text: Tamen ba an la suo chuangzao de guwu he shengchu zhong de yi fen fen gei an la. Tamen wangyan shuo:“Zhe fen shi gei an la de, na fen shi gei women de ouxiangmen de.”[Suihou you wangyan] fen gei tamen de ouxiangmen de buneng daoda an la, er fen gei an la de que neng daoda tamen de ouxiangmen. Tamen suo panding de zhen elie!
